Package ca.odell.glazedlists.hibernate

Interface Summary
EventListFactory A factory for EventLists, that is used by instances of EventListType and PersistentEventList to instantiate EventLists.
 

Class Summary
CategoryEventListFactory An EventListFactory implementation that uses a list category as key to determine, which ListEventPublisher and ReadWriteLock should be used to create EventLists.
EventListType A Hibernate custom collection type for mapping and persisting a BasicEventList with the help of a PersistentEventList.
PersistentEventList A Hibernate persistent wrapper for an EventList.
